summary: CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research, is a big science lab in Geneva, Switzerland. It was started in 1954 and now has 24 countries as members. CERN is famous for its Large Hadron Collider, a machine that smashes tiny particles together to study the universe. It also invented the World Wide Web. Over 12,000 scientists from 70 countries use CERN's facilities for research.
title: CERN
